data.expected_result: You should be able to click the chat or view isers
data.short_description: After scrolling awhile interface on discord app becomes unusable.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a big server Example: Discord Testerrs is where it was tested by me - Scroll to bottom to online users after Somewhat of 300+ bug hunters  - Once reached bottom at online users try to click a user or to the chat you cant
